title: New Music Stars Nominated for Brits Award
summary: Three new music artists, Sienna Spiro, Jacob Alon, and Rose Gray, have been chosen as nominees for the Brits Critics' Choice Award in 2026. This award helps find and celebrate up-and-coming talent in the music industry, picked by experts. The winner will be announced in January, before the big Brit Awards show in Manchester in February. Past winners include famous singers like Adele and Sam Fender. Rose Gray is excited and says this will help more people discover her music. She has already released an album and performed with other popular bands. Sienna Spiro was so surprised by the nomination that she didn't know what to say. This award is a big chance for these artists to become more well-known and share their music with the world.
